nodes.text: Still feeling badly about Esme?
<shrug>
Esme is a very special person. That's why I had to win her heart. She deserves only the best.
<shrug>
That certainly wouldn't be you.
I'm going to bed soon. Get some sleep... or not. Just don't make noise all night long.

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: If you cleaned this room up, you wouldn't be so depressed.
You really need to see Esme as soon as possible. She thinks that you are cute and she'd like to talk to you.
She does? Yes! She's the cutest woman I've ever met! I was afraid she'd think that I was too funny looking for her. I can't believe that she likes me.
This is the happiest day of my life!

options.text: Lie that Esme Doesn't Like Aeolus

nodes.text: I talked to Esme about you today. I don't think she likes you very much. She said that you were funny-looking and she doesn't like the sound of panpipes.
She doesn't like my panpipes? Nooooo!
I know I'm funny-looking, but I thought that Esme liked my music.

options.text: Ask Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: Try to get some rest, Aeolus.
<shrug>
I'm so happy that I won't need to sleep... the thoughts of Esme will keep me singing all night.
Just try to keep from singing out loud, please.
Esme thinks that you are the perfect match for her. You really need to ask her out on a date soon.
Awesome! I'll ask her out as soon as possible. I can't wait to sing my latest songs to her.

options.text: Tell Aeolus that Esme Prefers Shawn

nodes.text: I talked to Esme about you today. I'm afraid she's in love with someone else.
Esme's in love with someone else? Who?
She says that she's fallen in love with me.
With you? All this time, I thought you were my friend. I didn't know you would take my love away from me.

options.text: Ask Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: Try to get some rest.
<shrug>
I'll be up all night thinking of Esme.
Esme says that you are a very funny guy. She can't wait for you to ask her out.
Really? Great... I'll ask her out tomorrow. Maybe she'd like to go busk for coins on the street.
I talked to Esme earlier... It turns out that Esme has a crush on me. She's just wild about me and I never realized it.
She's in love with you? Did you even talk about me?
I'm talking to Esme tomorrow. I'll tell her just how much I love her. Then we'll see whom Esme loves best.
I hope you don't break Esme's heart the way she's broken mine.

options.text: Say that You Didn't Talk to Esme

nodes.text: I didn't manage to talk to Esme today about you.
That's okay. I'll get up the nerve to speak with her tomorrow. I got to do it sometime.

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: You'll feel better in the morning if you get some sleep.
<shrug>
You should try to get some sleep tonight.
I'll be up all night making up new songs to sing about Esme.
Did you manage to speak to Esme today?
Not yet... but I plan to catch up with her tomorrow afternoon. I'll let her know how I feel about her then.

options.text: Ask Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: You should rest up for tomorrow.
It's going to be hard to sleep... I'll be thinking of everything I want to say to Esme.
